channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump wins Pennsylvania, on brink of presidency
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris' path to victory got incredibly narrow after 2 a.m. Wednesday as former President Donald Trump won Pennsylvania, almost c...

item.title: ‘Ann Selzer’s Wrong!’: Pollster Who Saw Harris Winning Red Iowa Misses Bigly
item.description: No one who knows anything about Iowa politics or hasn’t been lobotomized saw Selzer’s numbers for what they were: garbage.

item.title: Here's how VP-elect JD Vance's Senate seat will be filled
item.description: With Sen. JD Vance poised to take on the role of vice president, here is how the state will fill the looming Senate vacancy.

item.title: Republicans flip open House seat in Michigan with Tom Barrett's win
item.description: House Republicans earned their first election pick-up early Wednesday as they flipped an open House seat in Michigan.

item.title: Julia Roberts, Home-Wrecker, Nation-Destroyer
item.description: ‘Your Turn, Honey’ promotes a movie star’s anti-American revolt.

item.title: President again: Trump secures historic second White House win
item.description: In a stunning comeback, former President Donald Trump recaptured the White House, winning a second term and a "MAGA mandate" that not only followed de...

item.title: Trump Takes Battleground Pennsylvania
item.description: Trump did better than he did in 2020, and Harris performed worse than Biden did in 2020.

item.title: America Doesn’t Need a National ‘Coach’
item.description: We shouldn’t look to a ‘coach in chief’ to rescue us politically from the top down.

item.title: Trump Turns Wisconsin Red Again
item.description: Trump’s victory in swing state Wisconsin followed on the heels of his win in another critical so-called 'blue wall' state, Pennsylvania.

item.title: Life Wins in Florida
item.description: Florida voters decline to embrace abortion on demand.

item.title: Donald Trump Declares Victory: ‘God Spared My Life For A Reason’
item.description: 'This will truly be the golden age of America,' Trump said in his speech. 'We're gonna make you very proud of your vote.'

item.title: 7 states vote to protect abortion rights, 3 keep restrictions in place
item.description: Abortion-related measures were on the ballot in 10 states Tuesday, with advocates claiming seven victories and three states voting to keep restriction...

item.title: Depressed media react to Trump victory: How could this possibly have happened?
item.description: For left-leaning commentators who said 2024 could be America’s last election if former President Donald Trump won, the outcome – which included Republ...

item.title: Hamas reacts to Trump victory, says he must 'work seriously to stop the war' in Gaza
item.description: The Palestinian terrorist group Hamas says Donald Trump and his new administration must "work seriously" to stop the war in the Gaza Strip.

item.title: European Economic Sclerosis Is Here to Stay
item.description: It would seem to be only a matter of time before the euro zone experiences another round of the sovereign-debt crisis — this time centered on France a...

item.title: Navy SEAL Tim Sheehy ousts 3-term Sen. Jon Tester in Montana Senate race
item.description: Former Navy SEAL Tim Sheehy has beaten three-term Democrat Sen. Jon Tester in Montana, flipping a key race as Republicans are set to take back control...

item.title: Midwest Voters Side With Unborn Babies On State Ballot Measures
item.description: Voters in two Midwest states, Nebraska and South Dakota, defeated measures to expand abortion.

item.title: Republican Tim Sheehy defeats 3-term incumbent to win Montana U.S. Senate seat
item.description: Republican Tim Sheehy defeated three-term Democratic U.S. Sen. Jon Tester. The victory by the former U.S. Navy SEAL bolsters the GOP's new Senate majo...

item.title: GOP Rep. Marcus Molinaro loses reelection to Democrat Josh Riley
item.description: Rep. Marcus Molinaro of New York, a Republican in a swing congressional district, lost his reelection late Tuesday night to Democrat Josh Riley.

item.title: 2024 Election: Live Updates
item.description: Follow along for live updates and analysis from the NR team on the 2024 election results.
